name: Home Page Footer Navigation
description: This feature deals with the Search for clinics

elements.name: Validate Footer Contains "Search for clinics" click

steps.name: User is on the Home page
User scrolls to the footer section
The footer should contain a visible link labeled "Search for clinics"
User clicks the "Search for clinics" link
Filtered clinic results should be displayed
